title: AmizOwned
description: Used by tens of thousands of students across all Amity University campuses. AmizOwned is the only application you need to survive in Amity University!

AmizOwned helps you keep an eye on important stuff such as monitoring your attendance, viewing the timetable, and lots more in a whole new way. With a beautifully crafted design and intelligently presented information, focus only on what's important and nothing else.

actions.name: Get the app from Google Play
